entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 p.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of drizzle overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
